languages.text: "Да, конечно. Я не заслуживаю смерти. Почему я вообще сомневалась, когда вот оно, решение всех моих проблем? Мы же так долго шли к этому... Что ж, шепотки мои, пора оставить меня в покое и немного усунуться за вашу любимую дверку".

traits.locale_text: "Да, конечно. Я не заслуживаю смерти. Почему я вообще сомневалась, когда вот оно, решение всех моих проблем? Мы же так долго шли к этому... Что ж, шепотки мои, пора оставить меня в покое и немного усунуться за вашу любимую дверку".

languages.text: "Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."
languages.original_text: "Да, конечно. Я не заслуживаю смерти. Почему я вообще сомневалась, когда вот оно, решение всех моих проблем? Мы же так долго шли к этому... Что ж, шепотки мои, пора оставить меня в покое и немного усунуться за вашу любимую дверку".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear whispers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

"Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear whispers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

"Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

"Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

"Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

languages.text: “是啊，没错，我不该死在这里。所有问题的解决方案就摆在我面前，我为什么还要怀疑呢？为了这个目标，我们已经走了这么远……好了，我亲爱的小低语者。是时候安安静静地呆在你们最喜欢的门后面，让我一个人静静了。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，没错，我不该死在这里。所有问题的解决方案就摆在我面前，我为什么还要怀疑呢？为了这个目标，我们已经走了这么远……好了，我亲爱的小低语者。是时候安安静静地呆在你们最喜欢的门后面，让我一个人静静了。”

languages.text: «Sí, por supuesto. No merezco morir. ¿Por qué iba a dudar de mí misma cuando tengo delante la solución a todos mis problemas? Hemos llegado tan lejos para conseguirla... Bueno, mis queridos susurros, es hora de que me dejéis tranquila un rato y os retiréis en silencio detrás de vuestra puerta favorita».
languages.original_text: "Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, por supuesto. No merezco morir. ¿Por qué iba a dudar de mí misma cuando tengo delante la solución a todos mis problemas? Hemos llegado tan lejos para conseguirla... Bueno, mis queridos susurros, es hora de que me dejéis tranquila un rato y os retiréis en silencio detrás de vuestra puerta favorita».

languages.text: "Ja, natürlich. Ich verdiene es nicht, zu sterben. Warum sollte ich an mir selbst zweifeln, wenn die Lösung für all meine Probleme vor mir liegt? Wir haben so viel auf uns genommen ... Nun, meine lieben kleinen Flüsterer, es wird Zeit, dass Ihr mich eine Weile allein lasst und ganz still hinter Eurer Lieblingstür sitzt."
languages.original_text: "Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, natürlich. Ich verdiene es nicht, zu sterben. Warum sollte ich an mir selbst zweifeln, wenn die Lösung für all meine Probleme vor mir liegt? Wir haben so viel auf uns genommen ... Nun, meine lieben kleinen Flüsterer, es wird Zeit, dass Ihr mich eine Weile allein lasst und ganz still hinter Eurer Lieblingstür sitzt."

languages.text: 「ええ、もちろんよ。ここで死ぬべきじゃない。すべての問題への答えがここにあるのに、自分を疑うなんてどうかしてたわ。このために長い道のりを歩んできたんだから…。さあ、親愛なるささやきたち。しばらく私を一人にして、あなたたちのお気に入りの扉の後ろで静かに待っていて」
languages.original_text: "Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、もちろんよ。ここで死ぬべきじゃない。すべての問題への答えがここにあるのに、自分を疑うなんてどうかしてたわ。このために長い道のりを歩んできたんだから…。さあ、親愛なるささやきたち。しばらく私を一人にして、あなたたちのお気に入りの扉の後ろで静かに待っていて」

languages.text: « Oui, bien sûr. Je ne mérite pas de mourir. Pourquoi douter quand la solution à tous mes problèmes est devant moi ? Nous avons parcouru un long chemin pour trouver ceci... Eh bien, mes chers petits murmures, il est temps pour vous de me laisser un peu tranquille et de retourner derrière votre porte préférée. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, bien sûr. Je ne mérite pas de mourir. Pourquoi douter quand la solution à tous mes problèmes est devant moi ? Nous avons parcouru un long chemin pour trouver ceci... Eh bien, mes chers petits murmures, il est temps pour vous de me laisser un peu tranquille et de retourner derrière votre porte préférée. »

languages.text: "Tabii, evet. Ölmeyi hak etmiyorum. Tüm sorunlarımın çözümü buradayken neden kendimden şüphe edeyim ki? Bunun için uzun bir yol katettim. Değerli fısıltılarım, beni biraz yalnız bırakmanızın ve en sevdiğiniz kapınızın ardında sessizce oturmanızın vakti geldi."
languages.original_text: "Yes, of course. I don't deserve to die. Why would I doubt myself when the solution to all my problems is right here? We've come such a long way for this... Well, my dear little whisperers, time for you to leave me alone for a while and sit quietly behind your favourite door."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii, evet. Ölmeyi hak etmiyorum. Tüm sorunlarımın çözümü buradayken neden kendimden şüphe edeyim ki? Bunun için uzun bir yol katettim. Değerli fısıltılarım, beni biraz yalnız bırakmanızın ve en sevdiğiniz kapınızın ardında sessizce oturmanızın vakti geldi."
